Translations.Text: Ni$ lmumnin rebeen
Wid ipeallan s wannuz
wid ijunben yir awal
wid ipzekkin
wid ieurben af tuzzuft nnsen
siwa ar tlawin nnsen, ne$ taklatin nnsen. Akka, ur degsen tiyta
wid ib$an sennig waya, widak zegren tilisa
wid ipqadaren lamanat nnsen, u lemaahda nnsen
wid iwennaen tieilla nnsen
D wigi ay d iweooaten
wid ara iweoten Loennet, degs ad wekkoen
Ni$ Nexleq amdan, seg ufuil n talaxt
sinna, Nerra t d tiqqit deg umekkan n laman
sinna, tiqqit Nxelq ip d argen; d$a, argen Nxelq it d acelleqluq; d$a, acelleqluq Nxelq it d i$san; d$a, Nessels aksum i yi$san. Sinna, Nxelq it d lxelq amaynut. Ad Ibarek Oebbi, Imxeyyeo ixellaqen
Sinna, deffir waya, war ccekk, a ppemmtem
Sinna, ih, ass n tnekra, a d tu$alem
Ni$ Nexleq, sennig wen, ua iberdan. Ur Nelli, $ef uxlaq, seg i$wefliyen
Nessader ed, seg igenni, aman s lmizan. Naateq iten di tmurt. Nezmer a ten Nessoue
Nxelq awen, yissen, leonanat n tezdayin akked teuoin; degsen, i kunwi, aias n yizwayen, teppeppem segsen
Akked ttejoa, id iff$en seg udrar n Sina. Teppak ed zzit u ddhin, i wid iteppen
Ih, di lmal, aselmed i kunwi. Nesswa kwen s wayen illan deg iaabbav nnsen. Aias n uba$uo degsen, i kunwi. Teppeppem segsen
Fellasen, u $ef lbabuo, ppawin kwen
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue i ugdud is. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Aabdet Oebbi. Ur awen illi oebbi, war Neppa. Day ur tepeezziben ara
Nnan imvebboen ijehliyen, n ugdud is: "wagi d amdan kan, am kunwi; ib$a a d ikk sennig wen. Lemmer i S ihwi i Oebbi, a d Issers lmalayek. Ur nesli s waya, ar lejdud nne$ imezwura
Neppa d argaz kan aoehbani. Qaoaaet ep, tallit kan
Inna: "a Mass iw! Awes iyi, skaddben iyi

Nweeea yas d: "eunaa lbabuo, ger wallen nne£, s uweeei nne£. Mi d iusa lameo nne£, la pfeggiven igwefran, d ihedman, awi degs, tayuga n yal uuenf, akked twacult ik, siwa wid, segsen, i$ef id izwar wawal. Ur iyI d steqsay af wid idensen, nitni, war ccekk, ad pwa$evsen
Mi taanncev di lbabur, kecc akked wid illan yidek, ini: ccekoan i Oebbi i $ Iselken seg ugdud imednas
Ini: "a Mass iw! Ssers iyi deg umekkan ioqan; Kecc Tifev akw wid issrusun
War ccekk, ayagi, d issekniyen, u Nekwni, Nezga d wid ipjeooiben
Sinna, Nxelq ed, deffir sen, isuta nniven
Nuzen asen d amazan, segsen: "aabdet Oebbi, ur tesaim oebbi, war Neppa. Day ur tepeezzibem ara
Nnan imvebboen ijehliyen n ugdud is, wid iugin u inekoen timlilit n laxeot, wid Ne$na di tmeddurt n ddunit: "wagi d amdan kan am kunwi, itepp seg wayen teppeppem, itess seg wayen teppessem
Ma tessemeessem i umdan i kwen icban, war ccekk, kunwi seg imexsuoen
Day i wen iaahed ard a d teff$em mara temmtem, tu$alem d akal, d i$san
Ibaad, Ibaad, ayen i wen ippuwaaaden
I illan kan, d tameddurt n ddunit. A nemmet, a nidir, nekwni ur d neppenkar
Neppa, d argaz kan id igren tikerkas $ef Oebbi. Nekwni, ur numin yis
Inna: "a Mass iw! Awes iyi, skaddben iyi
Inna: "garane$ d cwii, a d gwrin di nndama
Iwwet iten usu$u, s tidep. Nerra ten d rrmim. Err akin, agdud imednas
Sinna, Nxelq ed, deffir sen, isuta nniven
Lois ur d isseqoab, ur iswexxio, lajel is
Sinna, Nuzen ed imazanen nne£, wa deffir wa. Yal tikelt ideg ara d ias umazan, ar lois is, a t skiddben. Nerra ten mestebaan, Nerra ten d tidyanin. Err akin, agdud ur neppamen
Sinna, Nuzen ed Musa akked gma s Haoun, s issekniyen nne£, akked udabu n uuee
eo Feraun akked imvebboen is. Sme$woen iman nnsen. Llan d agdud amzuxxi
Nnan: "Day a namen sin imdanen am nekwni, u agdud nnsen d aklan nne
Skaddben ten, d$a u$alen seg wid ipwan$an
Ni$ Nefka Tazmamt i Musa, amar ad pwanhun
Nerra mmi s n Meryem, akked imma s, d assekni. Nesduri ten di ti$ilt, degs laman d waman
A yimazanen, eccet seg wayen imaanen, xedmet ayen ilhan, Nek, eoi$ ayen txeddmem
Lois agi nnwen, s tidep, d lois yiwen. Nek, d Mass nnwen, ihi eezbet iyI
Bvan lameo nnsen garasen, mi mfaoaqen. Yal akabar ifoee s wayla s
Eoo iten di maylellif nnsen, tallit kan
Day $ilen mi sen Nefka ayla, tarwa
ad asen Nezzazal lxio? Xaii, ur faqen
Ih, wid, si tugwdi n Mass nnsen, peadaren
wid iumnen s issekniyen n Mass nnsen
wid ur nepcarak i Mass nnsen
wid ippaken ayen fkan, ulawen nnsen ugaden mi, nitni, ad u$alen ar Mass nnsen
widak, peirin ar lxio u, $uoes, zeggwiren
Ur Nepkellif taowiet, siwa ar wayen iwumi tezmer. £uone£ Tazmamt, tessawal tidep. Nitni ur twadensen
Maca, ulawen nnsen di maylellif, $ef tagi. U rnan yir igiten i waya, a ten xedmen
Alamma, mi Nesaadda aaaqeb $ef isaayen nnsen, a d su$en
Ur psu$ut, ass agi, kunwi, segne$, ur tepwasellkem
Ni$ mlan awen issekniyen iW, trewlem asen
tesme$woem iman nnwen fellasen. Teppaawazem, tekkatem
Day ur meyyzen ara Awal? Day ur ten id iusa ara, wayen ur d nusi ar lejdud nnsen imezwura
Ne$ day ur ssinen ara amazan nnsen, imi t nekoen
Ne$ qqaoen: "ikcem it loenn"? Xaii, iusa ten id s tidep. Tegwti degsen, kerhen tidep
Lemmer tedda tidep d lhawiyyat nnsen, war ccekk, tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan degsen, ad fesden. Xaii, Nebbwi yasen d asmekti nnsen. Nitni asmekti nnsen ooan t
Ne$, ad asen tessutrev taqdiat? Ppif taqdiat n Mass ik. Neppa Yif akw ioeeeaqen
Kecc, s tidep, la ten tneccdev s abrid uwqim
Wid ur numin ara s laxeot, s tidep, ff$en i ubrid
Xas Neun fellasen, u Nekkes asen ccqa nnsen, ad vellelen di leqheo nnsen, ad ddebdeben
Ni$ Nesaadda fellasen aaaqeb. Ur knan i Mass nnsen, ur nujen
Armi, mara asen Nelli tabburt uaaqeb iqeseen, imiren, degs, ad aysen
Neppa i wen Ixelqen timesliwt, ieoi, ulawen. Drus ay tesnemmirem
Neppa ikwen Iwezzaen di tmurt. £uoeS ara tepwafesrem
Neppa i Issidiren, i Ineqqen. IneS afraz n yiv akked wass. Day ur tefhimem ara
Xaii. Nnan akken d nnan imezwura
Nnan: "Ma nemmut, nu$al d akal, d i$san, day a $ d ssekren
Ni$ ippuaahed wayagi i nekwni, akw, zik, i imezwura nne$. Ayagi, siwa d timucuha imezwura
Ini: "wi p ilan tmurt, akked wayen illan degs, ma tessnem
A d inin: "d Oebbi". Ini: "ihi, day ur d tesmektayem ara
Ini: "anwa ay d Mass n ua igenwan? Mass n usgeld ameqwoaean
A d inin: "d Oebbi". Ini: "ihi, day ur tepeezzibem ara
Ini: "anwa i Isaan tagelda n yal cci, ger ifassen iS; Neppa Ipearab, ur illi ueareb fellaS, ma teppissinem
A d inin: "d Oebbi". Ini: "ihi, acimi tepwamelkem
Xaii! Nefka yasen tidep, nitni, war ccek, d ikeddaben
Ur Isai Oebbi mmi S. Ur illi oebbi ar tama S. Mulac yal oebbi ad iawi ayen id ixleq, wa ad iagwar wa. Gedha s Oebbi, seg wayen id snulfuyen
Amusnaw n wayen iffren akked wayen ur neffir. D Aalayan, sennig wayen pcaraken
Ini: "a Mass iw! Lemmer a yi d Tesseknev acu i sen ippuaahden
A Mass iw, ur iyi Ppara deg ugdud imednas
S tidep, Nezmer ad ak Nessken acu i sen Naahed
Err akin tucmip s lfayeq. Nekwni Neeoa, sennig wiyav, ayen d snulfuyen
Ini: "a Mass iw! Eerz iyi seg u$wayen n ccwaien. Ee
Eerz iyi, a Mass iw! Ur dgi ppilin
Armi, mi d tusa tmeppant yiwen degsen, inna: "a Mass iw! Err iyi
amar ad xedme$ ayen ilhan deg wayen ooi$". Xaii, d awal kan id inna. Tella, deffir es, tse$lit, alamma d ass n tnekra
Ma uuven di lbuq, assen, ur ppemyilin, ur pmesteqsayen
Wid iwumi eeay lmizan nnsen, nitni rebeen
Wid iwumi fessus lmizan nnsen, d nitni i issexsoen iman nnsen. Di Loahennama ad wekkoen
A ppesser$ tmes udmawen nnsen, ad asen zelgen icenfiren
Day ur awen qaren ara issekniyen iW, wanag la ten tnekoem
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! I$leb ane$ ccum nne$. Nella d agdud im$eoqen
A Mass nne$! Ssuffe$ ane$ segs. Ma nesnager, ihi, d imednas ay nella
Ad Yini: "qqimet degs, ur pmeslayet
Ih, illa urbaa n imdanen iW i iqqaoen: "a Mass nne$! Numen. Semmee ane$, Eun fella$, Kecc Tifev akw wid ipeunun
Tettihim fellasen armi i wen sseppun asmekti W, u tdessem degsen
Nek, assa, Kufa$ ten $ef wayen ueboen. D nitni, war ccekk, ay d imerbae
Inna: "aceal iseggwasen i teqqimem deg wakal
Nnan: "Neqqim ass, ne$ ur ibbwiv wass, steqsi wid ieepben
Inna: "cwii kan ay teqqimen, lemmer, s tidep, day tessinem
Day t$ilem Nxelq ikwen, kan, di rrayaa; ar ur d teppu$alem $uone£
Ay Meqqweo Oebbi, Agellid, Tidep! Ur illi oebbi, siwa Neppa, Mass n usgeld ukyis
Win inaaoen, ar tama n Oebbi, oebbi nniven, ur isai ppbut fellas, aqeiii s ar Mass is kan. Ih, ur rebeen ara ijehliyen
Ini: "a Mass iw! Semmee u Eun. Kecc, Tifev akw wid ipeunun
Tasurep, Nessader ip id, Neeppem ip id; Nessader ed, degs, issekniyen iberrzen, amar a d temmektim
Tin ne$ win iznan, jekwvet, yal yiwen segsen, tawinest iberdan; ur kwen p$aven $ef udem n Oebbi, ma tellam tumnem s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru. Arbaa n lmumnin, ad yili d anagi uaaqeb nnsen
Win iznan ur ippa$ siwa tin iznan, ne$ tamcarekt. Tin iznan ur p ippa$ siwa win iznan, ne$ amcarek. Ipwagdel waya i lmumnin
Wid itehmen tiaaoviyin, d$a ur d bbwin kue inagan, jekwvet pen iamet iberdan; ur qeblet ccada nnsen, d awez$i. Widen d iballa$en
Kkes ed wid isteooaen, deffir waya, u xedmen lfayeq. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Wid itehmen tilawin nnsen, ur sain inagan, siwa iman nnsen, yiwen segsen ad iggal s Oebbi, kue iberdan, ar neppa d bab n tidep
akked ubrid wis smus ar a t Ixzu Oebbi ma iskaddeb
Ur teppuaaqeb tmeiiut, ma teggul s Oebbi, kue iberdan, ar neppa seg wid iskadben
akked ubrid, wis smus ar fellas zzaaf n Oebbi, ma issawel ed tidep
A lemmer ur illi fellawen lfevl n Oebbi akked ueunu S! Oebbi, s tidep, Issuruf, d Bab n uuwab
Ih, wid isweulen tikerkas, d agraw segwen. Ur p$ilit d cceoo i kunwi, xaii, d lxio nnwen. Yal yiwen, degsen, ibbwi ayen ibbwi ubekkav. Aaaqeb abarar i win, segsen, i ibbwin amur ameqwoaean
A lemmer lmumnin, argaz tameiiut, mi s slan, meyyzen lxio, deg iman nnsen, u nnan: "wagi d tikerkas ibanen
A lemmer d bbwin, fellas, kue inagan! Ma ur d bbwin ara inagan, ar Oebbi, wigi, d ikeddaben
Lemmer ur illi fellawen lfevl n Oebbi akked ueunu S, di ddunit akked laxeot, a ppesaaddim aaaqeb abarar $ef wayen i$ef temcawaoem
Mi p id teggarem s yilsawen nnwen, u teqqaoen s imawen nnwen ayen ur tessinem, t$ilem d ulac. Neppa, ar Oebbi, d abarar
Lemmer, mi as teslam, tennam: "ur a$ issefk ara umeslay $ef waya! Gedha s yiseK! Wagi d acehrir abarar
Inuba kwen Oebbi ur teppalsem, am akka, d awez$i, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
Ipbeggin awen Oebbi issekniyen. Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab
Ih, wid ib$an a d iazel laao, ar wid iumnen, fellasen aaaqeb aqeoean di ddunit, di laxeot. Oebbi Issen, kunwi ur tessinem
A lemmer ur illi fellawen lfevl n Oebbi akked ueunu S! U Oebbi d Umain, Ipeunu

A wid iumnen! Ur teddut di lateo n Cciian. Win iteddun di lateo n Cciian, ar la iteddu di laao akked tuccva. Lemmer ur illi fellawen lfevl n Oebbi akked ueunu S, ur ippizdig degwen yiwen, d awez$i. Maca, Oebbi Izzizdig win i S ihwan. Oebbi Issel, d Amusnaw

Wid, degwen, iwumi ippunefk lfevl akked terkunt, ur pgalan $ef tikci i llzem, i ime$ban, i wid iunagen deg ubrid n Oebbi. Ad semmeen, ad ssurfen. Day ur teemmlem ara mara awen Isemmee Oebbi? Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ih, wid ipqeooiven tilawin zeddigen, istehzan, iumnen, ad pwaxzun di ddunit, di laxeot. Fellasen aaaqeb abarar
Ass ideg ara d cehhden $ef igiten nnsen, ilsawen nnsen, ifassen nnsen, ivaoen nnsen
assen, ad asen Ifk Oebbi ayen ppalasen, s tidep. Ad eoen ar Oebbi d Tidep ibanen
Yir tlawin i yir irgazen, yir irgazen i yir tlawin. Tilawin n laali i irgazen n laali, irgazen laali i tlawin n laali. Wigi ur ppkan deg wayen qqaoen. I nitni, ssmae akked ooeeq ukyis
A wid iumnen! Ur kecmet ixxamen ur nelli nnwen, alamma s tsrie, u alamma tselmem $ef imawlan nnsen. Ppif akka i kunwi, amar a d tesmektim
Ma ur tufim eedd degsen, ur kecmet alamma s tsrie. Ma nnan awen d: "u$alet", u$alet. Yif it wakka i uufawa nnwen. Oebbi Ieoa ayen txeddmem
Ulac u$ilif fellawen ma tkecmem ixxamen ur nepwazde$, ma tella t$awsa nnwen degsen. Oebbi Ieoa acu d teqqaoem, u wacu teppeffrem
Ini i wid iumnen ad brun i wallen nnsen, ad ssoen tuzzuft nnsen. Yif it wakka i uufawa nnsen. Oebbi, s tidep, Ieoa ayen xeddmen

Ini i tid iumnen ad brunt i wallen nnsent, ad ssoent tuzzuft nnsent, ur d sskanent, di zzin nnsent, siwa ayen d ivehoen segs, ad $umment idmaren nnsent. Ur d sskanent ccbue nnsent, siwa i irgazen nnsent, ne$ ibabaten nnsent, ne$ im$aoen nnsent, ne$ iqcicen nnsent, ne$ irbiben nnsent, ne$ atmaten nnsent, ne$ iqcicen n watmaten nnsent, ne$ wid n tsetmatin nnsent, ne$ tiqeddacin nnsent, ne$ taklatin nnsent, ne$ iqeddacen imudduzen, ne$ arrac ur nellemei. Ur kkatent dderz, ad ipwassen zzin nnsent uffir. Steooaet akw i Oebbi, a lmumnin, amar a prebeem
Jewoet i iazriyen nnwen, akked wid imaanen seg waklan nnwen, akked teklatin nnwen. Ma d ime$ban ay llan, a ten Ioeeq Oebbi, s lfevl iS. Oebbi d Ajemmal, d Amusnaw

Wid ur nufa ara ar a$en, ad ueboen ar ten id Ioeeq Oebbi, s lfevl iS. Wid, seg waklan nnwen, i ib$an ad asen tarum aserree, arut asen ma teeoam ten, d at lxio ay llan. Fket asen seg ayla i wen Ifka Oebbi. Ur peeppimet $ef teklatin nnwen, tiquebit, i rrbee nnwen di tmeddurt n ddunit, ma b$ant tezdeg. Ma teeppmen, Oebbi, deffir ueeppem nnsent, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ni$ Nessader awen ed issekniyen iberrzen, akked umedya n wid iaacen uqbel nnwen, d anabi i wid ipeezziben

Oebbi d tafat n tmurt akked igenwan. Amedya n tafat iS d takwap degs taftilt. Taftilt daxel n tqeoaap. Taqeoaap, amzun d itri acoaoaq, tecaal it ttejoa ioqan, tazemmurt ur nelli n ugmuv ne$ n utaram. Qoib a pfet zzit is, ur p tennul tmes. Tafat $ef tafat. Ippawi Oebbi win i S ihwan ar tafat iS. Ippak ed Oebbi imedyaten i medden. Oebbi Ieoa yal cci
Deg ixxamen i Ib$a Oebbi ad ufraren, ideg ara d immekti yisem iS, sbuccuaen T ssbee, tameddit
Irgazen ur tes$afal ttjaoa, ne$ ssuq, $ef usmekti n Oebbi, $ef teallit, $ef zzakat; ppagwaden ass, ideg ara nehwwalen wallen akked wulawen
Iwakken a ten Ikafi Oebbi $ef wayen xeddmen d amxallef, ad asen Irnu si lfevl iS. Oebbi Ip$iti win i S ihwan, war aktili
Igiten n wid ijehlen, am aylal deg uza$ao. Win ifuden, ad i$il d aman. Alamma mi ibbwev $uoes, ur ippaf acemma. A n iaf Oebbi, Issuli as leesab is. Oebbi Ip$awal deg uqeiii
Ne$ am tillas di yill le$miq. T$umm it lmuja, sufella lmuja, sufella asigna. Tillas sennig tiyav. Ma issuffe$ ed afus is, ur issawev a t iwali. Win iwumi ur Iga ara Oebbi tafat, ur isai tafat
Day ur twalav ara, sbuccuaen Oebbi i illan di tmurt akked igenwan? Ifrax deg waffug. Issen taeallit akked usbuccaa n yal yiwen. Oebbi Ieoa ayen xeddmen
N Oebbi tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. £uo oOebbi tu$alin

Ur twalav ara Oebbi Isseleay asigna, sinna, a t Izdi, sinna, a t Issem$weo? D$a a pwaliv ageffur a d iffe$ si zdaxel is. Isrusu d, seg idurar igenni, abruri. Ad Iwwet yis, win i S ihwan, a t Iveooef $ef win i S ihwan. Tafat n leboaq iS qoib a ppeglu s yieoi
Oebbi Ismizwar iv akked wass. Deg wayagi, s tidep, d aselmed i wid isaan ieoi
Oebbi Ixleq akw leayawan, seg waman. Garasen, illa win ippeenunufen $ef uaabbuv is, win ileeeun $ef sin ivaooen, win ileeeun $ef kue. Ixelleq Oebbi ayen i S ihwan. Oebbi, s tidep, Izmer i yal cci
Ni$ Nessader ed issekniyen iberrzen. Oebbi Inehhu win i S ihwan, ar ubrid uwqim
Qqaoen: "numen s Oebbi akked Umazan, nu$ awal". Sinna, deffir waya, iwexxeo urbaa segsen. Wigi ur llin d lmumnin
Mi pwanecden ar Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ad Ieudd garasen, arbaa segsen iwexxeo
Ma saan leeqq, a d asen $uoes, d imvuaen
Day helken wulawen nnsen, ne$ cukken, ne$ ugaden a ten Isneeyaf Oebbi akked Umazan iS? Xaii, widak d imednas
Timenna n lmumnin, mara ssutren aeuddu n Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ad Ieudd garasen, d tigi kan: "nesla, nouva". D wigi ay d imerbae
Win iouvan Oebbi akked Umazan iS, ippagwaden Oebbi, ipeezziben, nitni d isaadiyen
Ggulen s Oebbi, tagallit meqqwoen, ar ma tumoev asen, ard ad ff$en, war ccekk. Ini: "ur pgallat, annuz ipwassen. Oebbi, s tidep, Ieoa ayen txeddmem
Ini: "oavit Oebbi, oavit Amazan". Ma wexxoen, fellas, neppa, ayen kan i s sbabben, fellawen kunwi ayen i wen sbabben. Ma touvam T, a ppeppwanhum. I iwatan i Umazan, siwa awal ipbegginen

Iaahed Oebbi, i wid iumnen segwen, u xedmen ayen ilhan, ara ten Irr, war ccekk, d igensas di tmurt, akken Irra wid i ten id izwaren; ara ad asen Isseqaad ddin nnsen i$ef i ten Iouva; ar ad asen Issegwri laman, deffir tugdi. Aabden iyI, ur iyI pcaraken acemma. Wid ijehlen, deffir waya, widak d iballa$en
Beddet i teallit, zekkit, a$et awal i Umazan. Amar aeunu fellawen
£uowat a p$ilem wid ijehlen sfunnugen di tmurt. Axxam nnsen d times. A tu$alin tucmip

A wid iumnen! S uaammed nnwen ara d kecmen, $uowen, waklan nnwen akw wid, degwen, ur nebli$ ara, krav iberdan ideg ur telsim ara: uqbel taeallit n tafrara, $ef iihuo mara tekksem iceiiiven, deffir teallit n laica. Ulac u$ilif fellawen ne$ fellasen, ma wa ieuo wa, deffir lewqat agi. Akka i wen d Ibeggen Oebbi issekniyen. Oebbi Ieoa, d Bab n uuwab
Ma bel$en warrac nnwen, s uaammed nnwen, am wid i ten id izwaren. Akka i wen d Ibeggen Oebbi issekniyen iS. Oebbi Ieoa, d Bab n uuwab
Ulac u$ilif $ef tauqao i iaaddan i jwao, ma kksent iceiiiven nnsent, mebla ma sseknent ccbue nnsent. Ma seteant, yif it i nitenti. Oebbi Issel, d Amusnaw

Ur telli tiyta deg uder$al, ne$ deg urejdal, ne$ deg umuvin, ne$ degwen, ma teccam deg ixxamen nnwen, deg wid n ibabaten nnwen, deg wid n tyimmatin nnwen, deg wid n watmaten nnwen, deg wid n tsetmatin nnwen, deg wid iaammiten nnwen, deg wid n taammitin nnwen, deg wid ixaliten nnwen, deg wid n txaltitin nnwen, deg wid ideg tesaam tisura, ar uebib nnwen. Ulac u$ilif fellawen ma teccam d agraw, ne$ d ifoiden. Mara tkecmen ixxamen, msalamet s wazul ioqan, aemayan, s$uo Oebbi. Akka i wen d Ibeggen Oebbi issekniyen. Amar a pfehmem

Lmumnin, siwa wid iumnen s Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Ma llan yides $ef lameo iten icerken, ur poueun alamma ssutren as tsrie. Ih, wid i k issuturen tsrie, d nitni i iumnen s Oebbi akked Umazan iS. Ma ssutren ak tsrie, $ef kra iten iaanan, serree i win i k ihwan, segsen. Ssuter i Oebbi ad sen Isemmee. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Ur eepbet asiwwel garawen i Umazan, am mara temsawalem. Ih, Ieoa Oebbi wid, segwen, ippensaren s tuffra. Ad steedren wid mgirrden lameo iS: ad ppuhewwlen, ne$ ad saaddin aaaqeb aqeoean
Ih, day macci n Oebbi, i illan di tmurt akked igenwan? Ni$ Ieoa amek tellam $uoeS. Ass n tu$alin nnsen $uoeS, ad asen Imel d acu xedmen. Oebbi Issen yal cci
Ad Ioqu Win id Issadren afraz, i umdan iS, iwakken ad yili d aneddao imavalen
Win Ilan tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan; ur Isai mmi S; ur aS illi ucrik di tgelda. Ixleq yal cci, Iwezn it s lmizan
Ddmen, war Neppa, ioebbiten ur nexliq acemma. D nitni i ipwaxelqen. Ur pseyyin vveo ne$ aba$uo, i iman nnsen. Ur pseyyin di tmeppant ne$ di tmeddurt, ne$ di tnekra
Nnan wid ijehlen: "ayagi, d tikerkas kan. Isnulfa tent id, iaawen it, fellas, ugdud nniven. Ni$ densen u skaddben
Nnan: "d timucuha imezwura, i iura; qqaoen as tent uubee, tameddit
Ini: "Issader it id, Win Issnen sser n tmurt akked igenwan. Neppa, s tidep, Izga Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Nnan: "d acut Umazan agi i iteppen lqut, iteddun ar leswaq? A lemmer id irs $uoes lmelk, ara yilin yides d aneddao
ne$ ippunefk as ugerruj, ne$ isaa aqwio itepp segs"! Nnan imednas: "la teppeddum kan d urgaz iwumi sseeren
Wali amek id ppaken fellak imedyaten. Nnetlafen, ur zmiren ad pwanhun
Ad Ioqu Win ad ak Ifken, ma Irad, i ifen ayagi: leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen. Ad ak Issali lebouo
Xaii, nekoen imir. Nhegga d times i win inekoen imir
Mi ten twala si tama ibaaden, ad as slen s leeoaoa akked zzhir
Mara $lin degs, nitni pwarzen deg umekkan uqmiv, ad siwlen, dinna, i wangar
Ur ssawalet ara, assa, i yiwet n wangar, ssiwlet i waias n wangaren
Ini: "ppif ayagi, ne$ Loennet n lebda i Naahed i wid ipeezziben? D neppat ay d arraz, ay d taggara, i nitni
I nitni degs, ayen i sen ihwan, i lebda. D lemaahda i$ef Iuksan Mass ik
Ass ideg ara ten Ifser, nitni akked wid aabden, war Oebbi, ad Yini: "d kunwi i itelfen imdanen iW agi, ne$ d nitni i iff$en abrid
A d inin: "gedha s yiseK! Ur a$ issefk a neddu d bab, war Kecc. Maca, T$atev ten, nitni akked imezwura nnsen, armi ppun asmekti, u$alen d agdud ixeuoen
Atan nekoen kwen $ef wayen d tennam. Ihi ur tezmirem i tsensert, ne$ i leslak. Win idensen, degwen, a Nessukk fellas, aaaqeb ameqwoan
Ur d Nuzen, uqbel ik, imazanen, mebla ma llan teppen lqut, u teddun ar leswaq. Nerra kwen, wa ihewwel wa, ma a pueboem. Mass ik Izga la d Ismuqul
